hero.name: Timucin
hero.description: AI Research Engineer specializing in LLMs, LangChain, and machine learning. PhD candidate at ITU.

home.title: AI Research Engineer
home.subtitle: Building intelligent systems with LLMs, LangChain, and modern AI architectures. PhD candidate at ITU, lecturer at Istinye University.
home.featuredProjectsDesc: A selection of my work in LLM and AI development.
home.technologiesDesc: Tools and frameworks I work with daily.
home.letsWorkDesc: Interested in AI projects, research collaborations, or consulting? Get in touch.
home.project1Desc: Academic citation formatting tool with 50K+ users on GPT Store.
home.project2Desc: Autonomous curriculum matching system with LangChain and LangGraph.
home.project3Desc: Automated exam grading with LangSmith evaluation.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm an AI Research Engineer specializing in Large Language Models and autonomous agent systems. Currently pursuing a PhD at Istanbul Technical University.
about.exp1Desc: Ensemble learning and LLM pipeline development under TUBITAK 1505 project.
about.exp2Desc: Teaching Intelligent Agents and Machine Learning in Digital Game Design department.
about.exp3Desc: RAG-based translation system, disease prediction, revenue forecasting.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Projects in LLM, AI, and machine learning.
projects.project1Desc: Custom GPT agent for academic citation formatting. Automatic APA 7 format source generation.
projects.project2Desc: Autonomous agentic framework for inter-university curriculum matching. Semantic similarity usage.
projects.project3Desc: Automatic exam grading system. Monitoring with LangSmith, orchestration with LangGraph.
projects.project4Desc: RAG-based machine translation for MLPCare. Human-in-the-loop feedback mechanism.
projects.project5Desc: Multi-agent email management and query resolution system with AutoGen framework.
projects.project6Desc: Disease prediction with XGBoost and Random Forest under TUBITAK 1501 project.

talks.title: Talks & Education
talks.subtitle: Talks and courses at universities.
talks.talk2Title: Can Artificial Intelligence Fall in Love?
talks.talk5Title: A Mirror to Humanity: Artificial Intelligence

publications.title: Publications
publications.subtitle: Academic publications and book chapters.
publications.pub1Title: Large Language Models for Automated Personalized Feedback in SQL Education
publications.pub1Abstract: Personalized automated feedback system in SQL education using LLMs.
publications.pub2Title: GPT-based Audience Attention and Emotion Analysis
publications.pub2Abstract: Research on audience attention and emotion analysis using GPT models.
publications.pub3Title: Ex Machine, Next Machine, and Still Biased Machine
publications.pub3Authors: Unal, C., ..., Utkan, K. T., et al.
publications.pub3Abstract: Visual bias analysis on 6000+ synthetic images.
